bug.author: vmichals
bug.description:
Describe the bug ASHA promotes trials that are not yet completed in the next lower rung. Expected behavior From my understanding ASHA should not promote trials that didn't report a result. Steps to reproduce Use the following minimal dummy experiment script and make it executable: #!/usr/bin/env python from orion.client import report_objective from numpy.random import randn import time time.sleep(120) # set this large enough to be able to start multiple workers report_objective(randn()) # vim: set ts=4 sw=4 sts=4 expandtab: Run multiple (for me it happened with 3-4) workers (clusterssh is very convenient for this) with orion hunt -c planetgc_orion_config.yaml -n test_asha --worker-max-trials 5 test.py --epochs~'fidelity(1,64,base=2)' --learning-rate~'loguniform(.00001,.01)' --momentum~'uniform(.7,.95)' Fetch trial details with the following python script: from orion.client import create_experiment exp = create_experiment(name='test_asha') print(f"{'STATUS':^10} {'START':^30} {'END':^30} {'FIDELITY':^8} {'PARAMS_HASH':^35}") print('-'*120) for trial in exp.fetch_trials(): print(f"{trial.status:>10} {str(trial.start_time):>30} {str(trial.end_time):>30} {trial.params['/epochs']:>8} {trial.hash_params:>35}") This produces the following output for me: <denchmark-code> STATUS START END FIDELITY PARAMS_HASH ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ completed 2020-05-25 04:19:12.680012 2020-05-25 04:19:43.317895 1 72227ac933931b34ff548bc8e76edb5a completed 2020-05-25 04:19:12.724151 2020-05-25 04:19:43.362414 1 e8e56812294709896f4d063bfeb2d665 completed 2020-05-25 04:19:13.859707 2020-05-25 04:19:44.524475 2 72227ac933931b34ff548bc8e76edb5a completed 2020-05-25 04:19:13.923803 2020-05-25 04:19:44.561748 1 6c69424baa02529ed192c149f3710f61 completed 2020-05-25 04:17:09.541189 2020-05-25 04:17:40.249103 1 46b411cdecce47ec49da2bcb8785361c ... </denchmark-code>
Note, that the first and third row have the same parameter hash (identical configuration, except the fidelity dimension), but the third trial starts before the first has finished. Environment (please complete the following information):
OS: Ubuntu 18.04 Python version: e.g. 3.6.9 Or√≠on version: develop Database: PickleDB
In <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Epistimio/orion/blob/29c0dfc13637aa3add6a57ce585232d65afcc541/src/orion/algo/asha.py#L341>this line</denchmark-link> only filters out trials that have objective , not those with objective , which seems to be the initial objective value for trials. See PR <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Epistimio/orion/pull/396>#396</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: Thank you for the detailed issue. We really appreciate it. We'll get to it very soon.

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/bouthilx>@bouthilx</denchmark-link> just helped me find the issue in my config: The strategy item has to be directly in the experiment section not in the subsection producer! Thanks!
Thank for the feedback! We'll update the doc to make it clear üëç

<denchmark-link:https://camo.githubusercontent.com/208d50cabd9d101500fe5dd548265dcfa00e017e397395692a173e7116c1094a/68747470733a2f2f6769746875622e7472656c6c6f2e73657276696365732f696d616765732f6d696e692d7472656c6c6f2d69636f6e2e706e67></denchmark-link> <denchmark-link:https://trello.com/c/K2Ro4xkR/566-asha-suggests-points-not-contained-in-space>ASHA suggests points not contained in space</denchmark-link>

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/vmichals>@vmichals</denchmark-link> I tried to reproduce the issue with the configuration producer: strategy: StubParallelStrategy But the strategy was correctly set. Could you confirm if it's still failed on your side? Normally it should work but give you the following exception: <denchmark-code>WARNING:orion.core.io.resolve_config:(DEPRECATED) Option `producer` is deprecated and will be removed in v0.3. Use instead the option experiment: strategy: StubParallelStrategy </denchmark-code>

Unfortunately, I can't run that experiment right now, but the config that failed for me was: experiment: algorithms: asha: seed: null num_rungs: null num_brackets: 4 producer: strategy: StubParallelStrategy You checked the code and told me that the producer section should go to the top-level of the config, which worked for me.
